sentences.en: Business at the Neptune had been very bad during the last twelve months.
sentences.cn: 在过去的一年里,内普丘恩的生意非常的不景气.

sentences.en: He managed to walk a little farther - but he never reached the Neptune.
sentences.cn: 他又支撑着向前走了一小段路,但他永远也走不到内普丘思了.

sentences.en: I'm going to wreck the Neptune mine.
sentences.cn: 我要捣毁内普丘恩煤矿.

sentences.en: I've got a little Neptune High trivia for you.
sentences.cn: 我有些海王星高中的琐事告诉你.

sentences.en: It is all because, compared with Neptune, Pluto is very small.
sentences.cn: 而和海王星比起来, 冥王星体积又太小.

sentences.en: It is attracted by Neptune's gravity when the two planets get closer.
sentences.cn: 因此当两颗行星靠近时,冥王星就被海王星的引力吸过去了.

sentences.en: Neptune turned out to be a dynamic, stormy world.
sentences.cn: 海王星原来是个有生气 、 多风暴的世界.

sentences.en: Neptune was the god of the sea.
Somehow the geriatric Voyager 2, arthritic and partially deaf, managed to reach Neptune.
sentences.cn: 得了关节炎而且局部变聋 、 衰老的“旅行者2号”最后总算抵达海王星.

sentences.en: Soon I may make you my partner in the Neptune.
sentences.cn: 不久我可能要你当我内普丘恩的合股人.

sentences.en: The conjunction of Jupiter with Neptune shows creative imagination.
sentences.cn: 木星与海王星的合相显示出富创意的想象力.

sentences.en: The industrial troubles , which were threatening to destroy the Neptune, were wearing Arthur down.
sentences.cn: 产业危机正威胁着要把内普丘恩煤矿搞垮, 阿瑟已愁得垂头丧气了.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, it has a special orbit which overlaps with Neptune's.
sentences.cn: 然而不幸的是, 冥王星的轨道很特殊,与海王星是相交的.

sentences.en: Uranus, Neptune and Pluto are never visible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天王星 、 海王星和冥王星肉眼从来都不会看到.

sentences.en: What's the mean cloud top atmospheric pressure of Neptune?
sentences.cn: 海王星的平均云顶大气压是 多少 ?

trans.tran_cn: 海王星，（罗马神话）海神尼普顿
